name: Action Game Elaboration (SallyC)
description:
This is a multiplayer platformer action game, where players try to strike on the other's head to gain a point and avoid falling onto the ground and losing a point by jumping on the bubbles. This game is an elaboration of Bennett Foddy's action game at https://bfod.itch.io/clone-assignment-2.

Controls:

Player1 (orange seahorse): 

A: Move left

D: Move right

W: Press when landing on a cloud to jump higher

Player2 (green seahorse): 

←: Move left

→: Move right

↑:Press when landing on a cloud to jump higher

Sound sources:

https://freesound.org/people/AlaskaRobotics/sounds/221091/

https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/341492/

https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/217762/
